doc:
Joanna Merlin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joanna_Merlin 0 Joanna Merlin (born July 15, 1931) is an American actress and casting director who has worked with Stephen Sondheim and starred in the original Broadway production of Fiddler on the Roof. She has written two acting guides and is a faculty member of New York University's graduate acting program. In recent years, she has become known for her recurring role on Law Order: Special Victims Unit as Judge Lena Petrovsky. Joanna_Merlin ( born July_15_,_1931 ) is an_American_actress and casting director who has_worked with Stephen_Sondheim and starred in the_original_Broadway_production of Fiddler on the_Roof . She has_written two_acting_guides and is a_faculty_member of New_York_University 's_graduate_acting_program . In recent_years , she has_become_known for her_recurring_role on Law_ : Special_Victims_Unit as Judge_Lena_Petrovsky .
